Title: Aickarakkonathe Bhishaguaranmaar
Writer: Shibu Raj K. (dialogue), Shibu Raj K. (screenplay), Shibu Raj K. (story)
Actors: Vipin Mangalashery, Samarth Ambujakshan, Shivaji Guruvayoor, Lalu Alex
Plot: Sukumaran Vaidyar and his family, who run a charitable ayurvedic resort named Ayur Home. Despite the presence of a multi-specialty hospital in the area, the villagers of Aickarakkonam believe in the efficacy of Ayur Home.
